Text.Name: Weather_Sunny
Text.StoryDesc: 正因晴朗的天气而笑容满面

Text.Name: Weather_Overcast
Text.StoryDesc: 正因阴沉的天气而一脸沉闷

Text.Name: Weather_LightRain
Text.StoryDesc: 正因小雨沥沥而面色宁静

Text.Name: Weather_HeavyRain
Text.StoryDesc: 正因大雨瓢泊而面色烦躁

Text.Name: Weather_LightSnow
Text.StoryDesc: 正因小雪飘扬而略感开心

Text.Name: Weather_HeavySnow
Text.StoryDesc: 正因大雪纷飞而感到喜悦

Text.Name: Weather_DenseFog
Text.Desc: 罕见的大雾，伸手不见五指。
Text.StoryDesc: 正因为大雾弥漫而略显烦躁

Text.Name: Weather_SpringAir
Text.StoryDesc: 正因想着一年之初而充满干劲

Text.Name: Weather_Melancholy
Text.Desc: 不知道为什么，最近大家都很忧愁，让我也心生抑郁。
Text.StoryDesc: 正因弥漫的愁绪而愁眉苦脸

Text.Name: Weather_HarvestAir
Text.StoryDesc: 正因期待着丰收而笑容满面

Text.Name: Weather_Impetuous
Text.Desc: 最近心思很浮躁，很难静下心来。
Text.StoryDesc: 正因浮躁的风气而满脸不耐烦

Text.Name: Weather_Hail
Text.StoryDesc: 正因下冰雹而满脸忧色

Text.Name: Weather_MouldRains
Text.StoryDesc: 正因持续的梅雨而充满烦躁

Text.Name: Weather_Drought
Text.StoryDesc: 正因持续的干旱而满面忧色

Text.Name: Weather_Rainstorm
Text.StoryDesc: 正因暴雨如注而感到担忧

Text.Name: Weather_Fohn
Text.StoryDesc: 正因焚风来袭而揉了揉干燥的脸庞

Text.Name: Weather_DustStorm
Text.StoryDesc: 正因尘暴肆虐而吐了口沙子

Text.Name: Weather_LingRarefiedWave
Text.StoryDesc: 正因灵气枯潮而感到不安

Text.Name: Weather_LingUpWave
Text.StoryDesc: 正因灵气爆发而感到喜悦

Text.Name: Weather_HeatWave
Text.StoryDesc: 正因酷暑来袭而感到焦躁

Text.Name: Weather_ColdWave
Text.StoryDesc: 正因凛冬将至而感到不安

Text.Name: Weather_HeatWaveInWinter
Text.Desc: 寒冬中，一股暖流到来，太舒服了……
Text.StoryDesc: 正在暖流之中伸了个懒腰

Text.Name: Weather_ColdWaveInSummer
Text.Desc: 盛夏时，一股凉风吹来，太舒服了……
Text.StoryDesc: 正在凉风下发出一声舒适的叹息

Text.Name: Weather_PermanentNight
Text.StoryDesc: 正因永夜降临而感到恐惧

Text.Name: Weather_Miasma
Text.StoryDesc: 正因瘴气蔓延而捂住口鼻

Text.Name: Weather_LightningStorm
Text.StoryDesc: 正因雷暴肆虐而紧张万分

Text.Name: Weather_LuShu_SunnyDay
Text.Desc: 听到灵兽鹿蜀的叫声，好像人在唱动听的歌曲，真的很好听~
Text.StoryDesc: 正沉醉于灵兽鹿蜀的叫声中而笑容满面

Text.Name: Weather_SpringFestival
Text.StoryDesc: 正沉浸在节日的喜悦中

Text.Name: Weather_ZuShiBiHu
Text.Desc: 祖师降下庇护，门派中仙气弥漫。
Text.StoryDesc: 正沉浸在仙界降下的气息中
